title: Coordinate Between a Reporter and a Photographer
description: An editor needs to make sure a reporter and a photographer, who are in different locations, meet up at the right time and place for an assignment.

tasks.description: Create a shared calendar event for the assignment with the exact address and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Both team members have the correct logistical information.

tasks.description: Create a group chat for the editor, reporter, and photographer for real-time communication on the day of the assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A dedicated communication channel is established.

tasks.description: On the day, monitor the group chat to ensure the team members connect successfully at the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The editor confirms the team has met up and is starting the assignment.
